markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Summon Ensemble](/Feats.aspx?ID=3373) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 123</row>

**Archetype** [Spell Trickster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=126)

**Prerequisites**
[Spell Trickster Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3368); ability to cast [_summon instrument_](/Spells.aspx?ID=721)

</column>

---

When you cast _summon instrument_, you can modify its duration to be sustained, up to 1 minute. When you do, you summon a number of instruments equal to your spellcasting ability modifier that hover around you and play of their own accord. Once per turn when you Sustain the Spell, choose an opponent within 30 feet who can hear your performance. The target must attempt a Will save against the spell's DC; on a failure, it becomes distracted by your performance and becomes [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) for 1 round. The target is then temporarily immune for 24 hours.
name: Summon Ensemble
prerequisite: Spell Trickster Dedication; ability to cast _summon instrument_
prerequisite_markdown: [Spell Trickster Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3368); ability to cast [_summon instrument_](/Spells.aspx?ID=721)

</summary>
summary: When you cast  summon instrument , you can modify it to summon multiple instruments.
